title: Wire Magazine spreads designed by Nonformat
content:
Anybody know what font is being used in these titles?

thanks  
-Mert

author: plush

comments.content:
Was this designed by Non-Format? It feels like them.

- Lex

Yes, they are. Do you think they designed this typeface for personal use only? I’m afraid so..

Any opinion?

mert,

yes they are designed by non-format and never hit to market. i also remember these spreads back from 3 years ago. these display fonts were big and i remember seeing similar looking ones by other designers as well. why don’t you make your own? with esen karol of bilgi university we have created our own but not all the letters were drawn so it’s uncomplete. email me so i can send you our sketches.
an idea: why don’t you ask directly non-format?
